attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The past few years teenagers have been given disrespect from adults because all we are knowen as is "yobs". If you are a respectful teenager, you are still put into this "yob" catagory. This is common in society nowdays, but it should not be happening atall! The "Respect" policy only deals with teenage "yobs" and not to adult that are disrespectful towards teenagers because of their age.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
